Road cycling

I am riding all kinds of fast bikes with handlebars. I have already competed several cyclo-cross, road, and track races. I am also bike messenger and I am commuting on bike anywhere in town and mostly if its possible anywhere in Czechia. Feel free to follow me on Strava:

Follow me on STRAVA

Heatmap of my rides

2019

That was great year in cycling, I did 16 292 km, which is my personal record. Also did my longest trip in one sigle ride - 417 km.
